column4: could someone please help me with ubuntu 7, i can't get vmware server to install
under add/remove programs it tells me it detects and older version and to uninstall it and i do that and then go forward and it errors
read the documentation for apt-get to see how to use it. I told you the command you need
if you knew, you knew how to use the command I told you about. as you obviously don't: read the docs. you need them
stop fscking up and read the apt-get docs. you really need them
